struct DSAPublicKey;
DSA Public Key

struct DSAPrivateKey;
DSA Private Key

class DSASignatureOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Signature;
Object that can create a DSA signature

class DSAVerificationOperation: botan.pubkey.pk_ops.Verification;
Object that can verify a DSA signature
